title: And you fell.
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar-bhl]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:cyberpunk theme-number=1]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
Artwork based on [[[scp-8654|SCP-8654]]].

Special thanks to [[*user Haru Ken]] for some suggestions, assisting with modification, and making the awesome traditional Chinese version! Without his help, I probably wouldn't even consider putting this piece to the site.
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]
